content: **knitted shawl in drops kid-silk the piece is worked sideways with garter stitch ** ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ drops design pattern ks-215 yarn group a ------------------------------------------------------- **size** height measured down middle = approx 20 cm width measured along top = approx 108 cm **yarn** drops kid-silk from garnstudio belongs to yarn group a 25 g colour 01 off white **needles** drops circular needle size 3 5 mm length 60 cm **knitting gauge** 24 stitches in width and 48 row in height with garter stitch = 10 x 10 cm note needle size is only a guide if you get too many stitches on 10 cm change to a larger needle size if you get too few stitches on 10 cm change to a smaller needle size
